```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> a = np.empty((0, 2))
>>> from scipy.linalg import svdvals
>>> svdvals(a)
array([], dtype=float64) 
```

```py
>>> from scipy.stats import ortho_group
>>> orth = ortho_group.rvs(4)
>>> svdvals(orth)
```
